TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XsltSettings extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定 XSLT 功能，以在執行 XSLT 樣式表期間提供支援。

span.span: Specifies the XSLT features to support during execution of the XSLT style sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內嵌指令碼區塊和 XSLT`document()`函式上是選用功能類別。Embedded script blocks and the XSLT `document()` function are optional features on the class. 預設為停用這些功能。These features are disabled by default. 類別會指定哪個以支援這些選擇性功能。The class specifies which of these optional features to support. 啟用或停用 使用類別內容的功能。Features are enabled or disabled using the class properties. 然後，會將 物件傳遞至 方法。The object is then passed to the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > XSLT 樣式表可以包含其他檔案及內嵌指令碼區塊的參考。XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks. 居心不良的使用者會利用這一點，藉由提供您資料或樣式表，使您因執行他們而導致系統持續處理，直到電腦資源不足，來進行攻擊。A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed can cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources. 未啟用指令碼或`document()`作用，除非樣式表來自受信任的來源。Do not enable scripting or the `document()` function unless the style sheet comes from a trusted source. 如果您無法驗證樣式表中的來源，或如果樣式表不是來自受信任的來源，使用預設的 XSLT 設定。If you cannot verify the source of the style sheet, or if the style sheet does not come from a trusted source, use the default XSLT settings. ## Examples 下列範例會載入樣式表，並啟用 XSLT 指令碼支援。The following example loads a style sheet and enables XSLT script support. [!code-csharp[XslCompiledTransform.Load#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Load/CS/Xslt_Load_v2.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XslCompiledTransform.Load#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Load/VB/Xslt_Load_v2.vb#6)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設設定，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新物件不支援 XSLT`document()`函式或內嵌指令碼區塊。The new object does not support the XSLT `document()` function or embedded script blocks. > [!IMPORTANT] > 僅當需要指令碼支援且在完全受信任的環境中運作時，才應啟用 XSLT 指令碼。XSLT scripting should be enabled only if you require script support and you are working in a fully trusted environment. 如果您啟用`document()`函式，您可以限制可以藉由傳遞存取的資源物件方法。If you enable the `document()` function, you can restrict the resources that can be accessed by passing an object to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool enableDocumentFunction, bool enableScript) cil managed
Public Sub New (enableDocumentFunction As Boolean, enableScript As Boolean)

param.name: enableDocumentFunction

summary.span: 使用指定的設定，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 僅當需要指令碼支援且在完全受信任的環境中運作時，才應啟用 XSLT 指令碼。XSLT scripting should be enabled only if you require script support and you are working in a fully trusted environment. 如果您啟用`document()`函式，您可以限制可以藉由傳遞存取的資源物件方法。If you enable the `document()` function, you can restrict the resources that can be accessed by passing an object to the method. ## Examples 下列範例會載入樣式表，並啟用 XSLT 指令碼支援。The following example loads a style sheet and enables XSLT script support. [!code-csharp[XslCompiledTransform.Load#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Load/CS/Xslt_Load_v2.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XslCompiledTransform.Load#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslCompiledTransform.Load/VB/Xslt_Load_v2.vb#6)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable support for the XSLT document() function.

span.span: to support the XSLT document() function; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您啟用`document()`函式，您可以限制可以藉由傳遞存取的資源物件方法。If you enable the `document()` function, you can restrict the resources that can be accessed by passing an object to the method.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用內嵌指令碼區塊支援。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable support for embedded script blocks.

value.span: 表示支援 XSLT 樣式表的指令碼區塊，否則為 。

span.span: to support script blocks in XSLT style sheets; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 僅當需要指令碼支援且在完全受信任的環境中運作時，才應啟用 XSLT 指令碼。XSLT scripting should be enabled only if you require script support and you are working in a fully trusted environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 僅當需要指令碼支援且在完全受信任的環境中運作時，才應啟用 XSLT 指令碼。XSLT scripting should be enabled only if you require script support and you are working in a fully trusted environment. 如果您啟用`document()`函式，您可以限制可以藉由傳遞存取的資源物件方法。If you enable the `document()` function, you can restrict the resources that can be accessed by passing an object to the method. ## Examples 下列範例會載入支援 XSLT 樣式表`document()`函式和內嵌指令碼封鎖功能啟用。The following example loads a style sheet with support for the XSLT `document()` function and embedded script blocks features enabled.
